```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Goals

## Load data

```{r}
hh <- read.csv("../data/cleaned/herculano-houtzel-all.csv")
```


## Plot of Brain mass by number of neurons


```{r}
p <- ggplot(data = hh, mapping = aes(x=log(Mass_g), y=log(N_neurons)))
p + geom_point()
```
